name: Bogiatto Group
tag_list: business, coaching, training, performance, italy, us
overview: Founded by italian web “guru” Daniele Bogiatto, Bogiatto Group focuses on consulting with an innovative approach: web business coaching. Thanks to extensive experience in sales, training & consulting, Bogiatto Group focuses on developing business models that integrate web and real life. Among the various brands that compose the group, Web Business Academy, a web business training service and dbwebgate, a training system that teaches you how to improve your business performances in an ever-changing-world. The Group is based in Italy and US. Clients include top names in the field of training and other marketing platforms.
